CustomField.description: Segments accounts within a region based on new definitions from McKinsey based on regional revenue and other factors. Needed so regional businesses can make business decisions based on regional situation and needs. For example, regional top tier accounts would be those making up 50% of regional revenue. Jira Story # CMCM-4257
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tier names are the same as global tiers, but the definitions of each tier are based on regional values. Updates managed by global sales ops.
CustomField.label: Regional Account Tier
